byline.original: By DAVID E. SANGER and NICOLE PERLROTH

abstract: Defense Sec Ashton B Carter tours Silicon Valley as part of Pentagon's latest effort to shore up relationship with computer industry and invest in promising start-ups for cybersecurity and cyberwarfare; encourages young engineers to consider helping to defend country from cyberattacks by foreign hackers.
lead_paragraph: Computer industry mainstays are rolling out technology to block surveillance, including by the National Security Agency, which fears “going dark” on terror threats.

headline.main: White House Takes Cybersecurity Pitch to Silicon Valley
headline.print_headline: White House Takes Cybersecurity Pitch to Silicon Valley

snippet: Computer industry mainstays are rolling out technology to block surveillance, including by the National Security Agency, which fears “going dark” on terror threats.
